mapper.select: SELECT s.store_id storeId, s.manager_staff_id managerStaffId, a.address address, a.address2 address2, a.district district, a.postal_code postalCode, a.phone phone, c.city city, co.country country, sf.staff_id staffId, sf.first_name firstName, sf.last_name lastName, s.last_update lastUpdate FROM store s INNER JOIN address a ON s.address_id = a.address_id INNER JOIN city c ON a.city_id = c.city_id INNER JOIN country co ON c.country_id = co.country_id INNER JOIN staff sf ON sf.staff_id = s.manager_staff_id
